content: @Robert Dieterle @Lloyd McKenzie http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pas/2022May/specification.html#processing-prior-authorization-submissions-under-the-cms-exception says it's requesting balloter feedback, however the page it links to (https://confluence.hl7.org/display/DVP/PAS+Exception+Guidance) is an empty draft.
@Jean Duteau - did we link to the wrong page or did we forget to create it?
Just reviewing my notes and that was the URL that I was given to link. Mea culpa for not checking it for actual content.
Do we know what needs to go there?
